verbose_text: The protective effects are also partially dependent on adenosine kinase, as the inhibitor 4-amino-5-(3-bromophenyl)-7-(6-morpholino-pyridin-3-yl) pyrido [2,3-d] pyrimidine, 2HCl (ABT 702, 30 muM) significantly reversed the protective effect of both adenosine and inosine during hypoxia and re-oxygenation.
evidence: adenosine kinase, as the inhibitor 4-amino-5-(3-bromophenyl)-7-(6-morpholino-pyridin-3-yl)pyrido[2,3-d]pyrimidine, 2HCl (ABT 702, 30 muM) significantly reversed the protective effect of both adenosine and inosine
